result.reason: Major new feature (SFTP sidebar + file browser) requiring significant new UI infrastructure and SSH.NET integration — far outside current fork scope which focuses on stability and bug fixes
result.approach: Out of scope for current roadmap. Would require new SFTP panel, SSH.NET file browser, drag-and-drop support, and terminal path sync — essentially a sub-application. Recommend users use WinSCP or similar alongside mRemoteNG.

attempts.raw_output:
The issue requests an SFTP sidebar (file browser) for SSH sessions, similar to MobaXterm's feature, plus a monitoring bar. This is a major new feature requiring new UI panels, SFTP protocol integration, and SSH session coordination. No progress was made by the upstream dev who started exploring it.
